on reading compounds: 煙突【エントツ】chimney, smokestack, funnel (of a ship), stovepipe, carrying a passenger without turning on the taximeter
煙草【タバコ】tobacco, cigarette, cigaret, cigar, tobacco plant (Nicotiana tabacum)
水煙【ミズケムリ】mist over a body of water, spray, suien, four decorative metal plates joined at right angles forming part of a pagoda finial
煤煙【バイエン】dirty smoke, soot and smoke
kun reading compounds: 煙る【けむる】to smoke (e.g. fire), to billow smoke, to smoulder, to smolder, to be hazy, to look dim
煙草【たばこ】tobacco, cigarette, cigaret, cigar, tobacco plant (Nicotiana tabacum)
水煙【みずけむり】mist over a body of water, spray, suien, four decorative metal plates joined at right angles forming part of a pagoda finial
